game.name: Animals Memory: Horses
game.shortDescription: Animals Memory: Horses is a card game with pictures of different horses that will test your memory. The aim of the game is to find pairs of cards.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Animals Memory: Horses is a card game with pictures of different horses that will test your memory. The aim of the game is to find pairs of cards.

reviewHighlights.text: This is a classic memory game with animals. It also has easy achievements, however I would not recommend buying this game at full price, as it is quit...
